THIS MOD CONTAINS THE FOLLOWING:
== Charged - Arsenal ==
\\INFO\\ From the regal tech-lodges of Gjallarhorn comes an offering of high-end spacer-level melee weapons to suit the melee-centric connoisseur. Utilizing the same pulse-charge technology seeing much use in your favorite charge projectile weapons in a proprietary magnetic confinement shelling process, your favorite melee implements become powerful, high-frequency cutting, stabbing, and bludgeoning weapons that will satisfy you with its combat performance, high-end looks, and ease of use with Gjallarhorn's well-known energy matrix lattice pattern for life-long uptime.
== Charged Arsenal - Eltex Series ==
\\INFO\\ From the regal tech-lodges of Gjallarhorn comes an offering of advanced high-end eltex-weaved melee weapons to suit the psionically gifted melee connoisseur. Utilizing the successful magnetic confinement shelling technique to create pulse-charged blades as a baseline, these eltex-weaved melee implements offer excellent combat performance, excellent armor penetration capability, and "sublime psionic flow", the Eltex Series is the choice for any gifted among us.
== Ilya Tech - Core ==
\\INFO\\ Adds Variety of Heavy High Tech Technology developed by Ilya Tech from Gjallarhorn Empire.
== Vali's Ancient Crystals - Zaljerem's Continuation ==
\\INFO\\ An alternative for Medieval Fantasy Heaters and Coolers. Ancient Midgard Crystals are a type of crystal that are said to have originated on a Volcanic/Geo-Active Planet.
